example_sentence_english: I want to count to ten.

translation_english: he was counting/she was counting/you (formal) were counting

notes: used with auxiliary avere; past participle contato
example_sentence_english: I have counted to one hundred.

notes: used with auxiliary avere; past participle contato

translation_english: he has counted/she has counted/you (formal) have counted
notes: used with auxiliary avere; also used as formal 'Lei'; past participle contato
